author: Albert Einstein
quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.

author: Mark Twain
quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

author: Winston Churchill
quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.

author: Nelson Mandela
quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.

author: Steve Jobs
quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.

author: Aristotle
quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.

author: J.K. Rowling
quote: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.

author: Confucius
quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

author: Yoda
quote: Do, or do not. There is no try.

author: Henry Ford
quote: Whether you think you can, or you think you can’t – you’re right.

author: Mother Teresa
quote: Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love.

author: Martin Luther King Jr.
quote: I have decided to stick with love. Hate is too great a burden to bear.

author: Lao Tzu
quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.

author: Bruce Lee
quote: Be like water, my friend.

author: John Lennon
quote: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.

author: Voltaire
quote: I disapprove of what you say, but I will defend to the death your right to say it.

author: Leonardo da Vinci
quote: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.

author: Anne Frank
quote: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.

author: Buddha
quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.

author: Benjamin Franklin
quote: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.

author: Socrates
quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.

author: Plato
quote: Wise men speak because they have something to say; fools because they have to say something.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.

author: George Bernard Shaw
quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.

author: Pablo Picasso
quote: Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once we grow up.

author: Confucius
quote: Real knowledge is to know the extent of one's ignorance.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.

author: Helen Keller
quote: The only thing worse than being blind is having sight but no vision.

author: Ayn Rand
quote: The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me.

author: Dalai Lama
quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.

author: Walt Disney
quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

author: Albert Camus
quote: In the depth of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer.

author: Vincent Van Gogh
quote: I dream my painting and I paint my dream.

author: Charles Darwin
quote: It is not the strongest of the species that survive, nor the most intelligent, but the one most responsive to change.

author: Hermann Hesse
quote: Some of us think holding on makes us strong, but sometimes it is letting go.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.

author: Rumi
quote: Let yourself be silently drawn by the strange pull of what you really love. It will not lead you astray.

author: Nelson Mandela
quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.

author: Steve Jobs
quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.

author: Henry David Thoreau
quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.

author: Robert Frost
quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.

author: Confucius
quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.
quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.

author: Marcus Aurelius
quote: You have power over your mind—not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
